Package com.irurueta.units

Class WeightConverter

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.units.WeightConverter
public class WeightConverter extends Object
Does weight conversions to different units. To prevent loss of accuracy, conversion should only be done as a final step before displaying weight measurements.
